products.name: Spirit Wolf T-Shirt
products.description: Premium cotton t-shirt featuring the iconic Spirit Wolf logo. Soft, comfortable, and perfect for everyday wear. Available in sizes S-XXL.

products.name: Spirit Wolf Hoodie
products.description: Cozy fleece hoodie with embroidered Spirit Wolf design. Features a kangaroo pocket and adjustable drawstring hood. Perfect for cool evenings.

products.name: Spirit Wolf Art Print
products.description: High-quality art print of the original Spirit Wolf artwork. Printed on premium matte paper, ready to frame. Size: 18x24 inches.

products.name: Spirit Wolf Mug
products.description: Ceramic coffee mug featuring the Spirit Wolf design. Dishwasher and microwave safe. Holds 15oz of your favorite beverage.

products.name: Spirit Wolf Sticker Pack
products.description: Set of 5 vinyl stickers featuring various Spirit Wolf designs. Waterproof and UV resistant. Perfect for laptops, water bottles, and more.

products.name: Spirit Wolf Cap
products.description: Adjustable snapback cap with embroidered Spirit Wolf logo. One size fits most. Available in navy and black.
